title: Yamete Kudasai, Koishii Desu
description: In the process of getting their respective childhood friends Sasano and Koga together, Sugiyama and Hibiya grow closer and feelings deepen into something perhaps more than friendship. Maintaining this ambiguous relationship, they enter their second year of high school, but something may change when a transfer student starts asking around for Sugiyama!

matches.title: Don't Provoke a Reborned Bamboo Horse
